name: Manashosting
overview:
ManasHosting offers a variety of quality and effective web hosting services, such as unlimited space and bandwidth at lower costs, high speed and best server uptime, more e-mail ID space, latest Anti Spam and Anti Virus Protection, free domain transfer, one year Webspace free of cost, Multi Platform (Windows/Linux) reseller Package.. The company offers free of cost registration of domain with its web hosting packages.

At ManasHosting, the domain registration is valid for a limit of one full year, in which there is also a provision of the Domain Control Panel. This basically facilitates the client to have a complete control over his specific domain. It further allows the transfer of a particular domain to any other server at any time.

The company also offers the option to opt for a dedicated server solution for all the special requirements of its valuable customers. Having a dedicated server at ManasHosting offers reliability. It is because of the reason that a website or an application is hosted solely on the server, thus the customers would never have to face the risk of server being congested with requests of other people’s websites.
